Package org.springframework.boot.docker.compose.lifecycle

@NullMarked package org.springframework.boot.docker.compose.lifecycle
Lifecycle management for Docker Compose with the context of a Spring application.
  • Class
    Description
    DockerComposeProperties
    Configuration properties for Docker Compose.
    DockerComposeProperties.Profiles
    Profiles properties.
    DockerComposeProperties.Readiness
    Readiness properties.
    DockerComposeProperties.Readiness.Tcp
    TCP properties.
    DockerComposeProperties.Readiness.Wait
    Readiness wait strategies.
    DockerComposeProperties.Skip
    Skip options.
    DockerComposeProperties.Start
    Start properties.
    DockerComposeProperties.Start.Skip
    Start command skip mode.
    DockerComposeProperties.Stop
    Stop properties.
    DockerComposeServicesReadyEvent
    ApplicationEvent published when Docker Compose RunningService instances are available.
    LifecycleManagement
    Docker Compose lifecycle management.
    ReadinessTimeoutException
    Exception thrown if readiness checking has timed out.
    StartCommand
    Command used to start Docker Compose.
    StopCommand
    Command used to stop Docker Compose.
